title: Bundle 32.4.15 — Keyboard Hint Overlay (Try 1–5 to revert)
intent: Add non-intrusive overlay hint near History panel showing keyboard shortcuts 1-5. Auto-hides after 6 seconds, can be dismissed manually, suppressed when typing in inputs.

what_changed: Added showHistoryHotkeyHint ref for overlay visibility state
Added hintTimer module-level variable for auto-hide timeout tracking
Added hideHint() function to clear state and timer
Added scheduleHint() function to show hint with 6-second auto-hide
Added hasHistory computed property checking if historyStack has entries
Added watch(hasHistory) to show hint when history becomes available
Added onMounted logic to show hint if history already exists
Added typing suppression in onKeyDown to hide hint when user types in inputs
Enhanced @reverted handler to show toast with label and source tracking
Added keyboard hint overlay markup with title, body, and dismiss button
Added .hotkeyHint CSS for overlay appearance (absolute, white background, shadow)
Added .hotkeyHintTitle CSS for bold title styling
Added .hotkeyHintBody CSS for body text styling
Added .hotkeyHintClose CSS for dismiss button positioning and styling
diff_articulation.why_not_redundant: This is new functionality. No keyboard hint overlay existed before. Previous bundles only added toast feedback and button tooltips, not a persistent visual hint reminder.
